name: EventPlanner
description: REST API back end, React front end full stack MERN app monorepo event planning web app.
author: Joey Dalrymple

scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-client: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
